statements: SELECT * FROM recommendations;
SELECT recommendation, user_id FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE assistant_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, assistant_id, recommendation FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 1 AND assistant_id = 2;
SELECT recommendation FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY recommendation DESC;
SELECT * FROM recommendations ORDER BY user_id ASC, assistant_id DESC
SELECT recommendation FROM recommendations WHERE user_id=1 AND assistant_id=2
SELECT user_id, assistant_id, recommendation FROM recommendations WHERE user_id=3 ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT user_id, recommendation FROM recommendations WHERE assistant_id=4 ORDER BY recommendation
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, assistant_id FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation LIKE '%good%'
SELECT user_id, assistant_name, recommendation_text FROM UserRecommendations WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM UserRecommendations ORDER BY assistant_name DESC
SELECT user_id, recommendation_text FROM UserRecommendations WHERE assistant_name = 'John'
SELECT * FROM AssistantLogs WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC
SELECT assistant_name, COUNT(*) AS count FROM AssistantLogs GROUP BY assistant_name
SELECT * FROM UserRecommendations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM UserRecommendations WHERE assistant_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT user_id, recommendation_text FROM UserRecommendations WHERE user_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT user_id, assistant_name, recommendation_text FROM UserRecommendations ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS recommendations_count FROM UserRecommendations GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM recommendations;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users;
SELECT assistant_name, assistant_skills FROM assistants;
SELECT recommendation_text FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT assistant_name, assistant_skills FROM assistants ORDER BY assistant_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT assistant_id, assistant_name FROM assistants WHERE assistant_skills LIKE '%programming%';
SELECT recommendation_text FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email, assistant_name FROM users JOIN recommendations ON users.user_id = recommendations.user_id JOIN assistants ON recommendations.assistant_id = assistants.assistant_id;
SELECT * FROM personalized_recommendations;
SELECT recommendation, user_id FROM personalized_recommendations ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT action, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT feedback_text FROM assistant_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM personalized_recommendations ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, name, age FROM user_profiles WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY age ASC, name;
SELECT interaction_date, action FROM interactions WHERE user_id = 1001 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM assistant_feedback WHERE LENGTH(feedback_text) > 50 ORDER BY user_id, feedback_id;
SELECT user_id, name, email, location FROM user_profiles WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY name ASC, user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_assistants_recommendations;
SELECT user_id, recommendation FROM virtual_assistants_recommendations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM recommendations_history;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT recommendation, date_added FROM virtual_assistants_recommendations ORDER BY date_added DESC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_assistants_recommendations LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, recommendation FROM virtual_assistants_recommendations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT recommendation, date_added FROM virtual_assistants_recommendations ORDER BY date_added DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT rt.tag_name, vr.recommendation FROM recommendation_tags rt JOIN recommendation_tag_mapping rtm ON rt.tag_id = rtm.tag_id JOIN virtual_assistants_recommendations vr ON vr.id = rtm.recommendation_id WHERE rt.tag_name = 'technology';
